cards.name: 哨兵制造厂 Sentinel Manufactory
cards.description: 每回合开始时生成2个哨兵Token。哨兵回到此Lane时，回合结束自动回满血。
cards.effectText: At turn start: Generate 2 Sentinel tokens. Sentinels in this lane are auto-repaired at turn end.

cards.name: 普罗米修斯骑士 Promethean Knight
cards.description: 携带1个观察者。受伤时观察者弹出维修。死亡时生成数据残影，可被观察者复活。
cards.effectText: Carries 1 Watcher. On damage: Eject Watcher for repair. On death: Leave Data Remnant (revivable).

cards.name: 普罗米修斯爬行者 Promethean Crawler
cards.description: 可以跳过敌方前排，直接攻击后排辅助单位。集群作战时效率更高。
cards.effectText: Bypass Frontline: Can attack backline directly.

cards.name: 普罗米修斯观察者 Promethean Watcher
cards.description: 可以拦截手雷和实体炮弹。每3回合可以复活1个被摧毁的普罗米修斯骑士。
cards.effectText: Intercept projectiles. Every 3 turns: Revive 1 destroyed Knight from Data Remnant.

cards.name: 构造者哨兵 Aggressor Sentinel
cards.description: 基础哨兵单位。光束追踪：攻击不会落空。多个哨兵在同Lane时攻击力叠加。
cards.effectText: Beam Tracking: Never miss. Swarm: +1.5 damage per Sentinel in lane.

cards.name: 超级哨兵 Super Sentinel
cards.description: 专门对付轨道层舰船的防空哨兵。对飞行单位和舰船造成双倍伤害。
cards.effectText: Anti-Air: Double damage to orbital/air units.

cards.name: 合成器工厂 Composer Laboratory
cards.description: 收集敌方阵亡的生物单位数据。消耗5个数据可将1个哨兵升级为普罗米修斯骑士（需3回合）。
cards.effectText: Collect biological data on enemy deaths. Spend 5 data: Upgrade 1 Sentinel to Knight (3 turns).

cards.name: 索引器-阿尔法 Halo Index Alpha
cards.description: 环带协议的一部分。收集3个索引器并在地标停留3回合，可发射局部环带脉冲清除该Lane所有生物单位。
cards.effectText: Part of Halo Array Protocol. Collect 3 indices + 3 turns at objective = Fire pulse.

cards.name: 硬光步枪 Hardlight Rifle
cards.description: 攻击前排单位时，30%伤害穿透到后排。可切换射击模式。
cards.effectText: Penetration 30%: Damage overflow to backline when attacking frontline.

cards.name: 跃迁门 Slipspace Gate
cards.description: 建立两个Lane之间的空间连接。单位可以瞬间从一个Lane传送到另一个Lane（冷却2回合）。
cards.effectText: Establish portal between 2 lanes. Teleport units instantly (2 turn cooldown).

cards.name: 重力井 Gravity Well Projector
cards.description: 拦截该Lane的敌方空投单位。被拦截的单位不会损毁，而是被弹回对方手牌。
cards.effectText: Intercept enemy airdrops. Intercepted units return to opponent's hand.

cards.name: 343罪恶火花 343 Guilty Spark
cards.description: 指挥节点。所有哨兵命中率+50%，攻击力+2。销毁后所有哨兵命中率下降50%。
cards.effectText: Command Node: All Sentinels +50% accuracy, +2 damage. If destroyed: Sentinels -50% accuracy.
